channel.title: CW changes that might be good
channel.description:
I have three options in mind:
-------------- -**Make CW a neutral survivor** It's current abilities are great for one
-**Make CW a neutral evil** Wants to see the blue dragon lose. Again, abilities perfect for it
-**Completely change CW**
>**Day ability: Prepare spell** Choose from your spell book a spell to have available to you tonight
the five spells (keep in mind you do not recover any uses of a spell when it returns to your spell book)
**Divination** (1 use) Determine your target's faction and class type
**Abjuration** (1 use) Cast a ward on 3 players, protecting them from all negative effects except death
**Necromancy** (1 use) turn a dead player into a death knight
**Teleportation** (1 use) make all the visitors of one player move to another (one way tornado, basically).
**Fireball** (1 use) send a fireball to kill a player. If they somehow survive the attack, they will start bleeding
credit to aldggerlen on discord for reminding me of this idea and mentioning fireball
basically, CW would choose one of these spells to cast each night. Each is good, but one use. lots of strategy.
if you have any other ideas for good but 1 use spells, suggest them here

item.title: CW changes that might be good
item.dc:creator: Ulkesh
item.description:
It is a mix of several other classes, which I’m not a big fan of (classes should be as diverse as possible)

But because all these spells are 1-time abilities, I wouldn’t be against it. However…

… not instead of the current Court Wizard! (he is awesome!)

So if it were to be a Mage, I would be fine with it. Also note that Teleportation is already a spell with a different effect. The Ritualist has it. I would rename it for the new class to avoid confusing.
